elements.content: Nyquist plotprotonProtonprotonProtonprotonactivationactivation(a) The Nyquist plot for proton conductivity of Ca-SBBA at 298 K in 98% humidity. (b) Proton conductivity plots of Ca-SBBA at higher temperatures showing decrease in proton conductivity. (c) Proton conductivity plots of Ca-SBBA at lower temperatures showing decrease in proton conductivity following Grotthuss proton hopping mechanism. (d) Arrhenius plot of activation energy for Ca-SBBA showing activation energy value of 0.23 eV.
